verbose_text: The water extracts of Solanum nigrum (SN) have been shown to exert cytoprotection against gentamicin induced toxicity in Vero cells, suppress oxidant mediated DNA damage and induce necrosis in SC-M1 stomach cancer cells.
evidence: water extracts of Solanum nigrum (SN) have been shown to exert cytoprotection against gentamicin-induced toxicity in Vero cells, suppress oxidant-mediated DNA damage and induce necrosis
